science.author: John Wenz
science.title: Frankenstein planets may form from the wreckage of dead worlds
science.description: When stars die, they can explode and destroy any planets nearby. But new worlds could arise out of the debris and some could reach the mass of 10 Earths

science.title: Harsh: Europe’s cannabis died just as the first farmers arrived
science.description: Cannabis – the source of the drug marijuana – virtually disappeared from Europe just as farmers arrived, so they didn’t get the chance to grow it for another 4500 years

science.description: We now know what happens in your brain when inspiration strikes. The insight may lead to new brain stimulation techniques that put you in problem-solving mode

science.title: The US isn’t fertile enough to sustain itself without immigrants

science.title: Lizards keep evolving toxic green blood and we don’t know why
science.description: All the green-blooded lizards in the world live in New Guinea, but it turns out the trait has evolved there independently at least four times

science.title: Some of the universe’s first stars have actually been seen

science.title: We’ve measured the pressure inside a proton and it’s extreme
science.description: The pressure inside a proton is a billion billion billion times the pressure in the Mariana Trench, and 10 times higher than in the core of a neutron star
